title: SHRIMADHAV ASTROLOGY – Premium Vedic Astrology Website Frontend

requirements.summary: Apply global visual theme with ivory/cream background, gold and saffron accents, serif headings, sans-serif body text, celestial SVG patterns, and mobile-responsive layout
acceptanceCriteria: Background is ivory/warm cream throughout all sections
Gold (#D4AF37) is used for borders, dividers, and decorative accents
Saffron (#FF9933) is used for highlighted CTAs and price highlights
Headings render in a serif font; body text in a sans-serif font
Subtle mandala or celestial SVG pattern visible in hero/background areas
Layout adapts correctly on mobile (375px), tablet (768px), and desktop (1280px)

file_operations.description: Update global styles to set light ivory/warm cream background (#FAF6EF), define CSS custom properties for gold accent (#D4AF37) and saffron highlight (#FF9933), import Google Fonts (Playfair Display for headings, Inter for body text), and add base responsive typography styles

Extend Tailwind theme to include custom colors (ivory, gold, saffron), configure font families (serif: Playfair Display; sans: Inter), add background image utilities for celestial/mandala patterns, and ensure mobile-first breakpoints are configured
